about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey to ancient Greece in The Last King, an immersive open world survival game. As a courageous warrior, you must navigate a war-ravaged land teeming with enemies, including Persians, barbarians, and untamed wilderness. Forge your own destiny as you build a formidable base, recruit a mighty army, and liberate Greek villages from the clutches of oppression.

Key Features:


Battle Against Fierce Foes:

Engage in intense combat against a diverse range of enemies. From relentless Persian forces to brutal barbarian tribes, every encounter is a test of skill and strategy. Command your army with precision, employing a variety of tactics and formations to outmaneuver and overpower your adversaries.

Recruit, Train, and Equip Your Army:



Assemble a loyal band of warriors from different backgrounds and specialties. Recruit skilled soldiers, train them in the art of war, and equip them with powerful weapons and armor. Develop unique strategies to utilize their strengths and unleash devastating attacks on your enemies.

Build Your Base:



Construct and fortify your own base, shaping it into a bastion of power and safety. Customize your defenses, establish resource production, and strategize to withstand enemy assaults. Your base is the heart of your operations and the key to your survival.

Survive and Thrive in an Open World:

Explore a sprawling and dynamic open world, ravaged by war. Adapt to the harsh conditions of the wilderness, scavenge for resources, and master the art of survival in an unforgiving open world.

Free Greek Villages:

 Fight to liberate Greek villages that have fallen under enemy control. Storm enemy camps, destroy their strongholds, and rescue innocent civilians from oppression. Your heroic deeds will inspire hope and rally the people to your cause.

Play Your Way:

 Choose your preferred playstyle and specialize in a variety of combat roles. Master the art of the spear, wield a mighty sword, or rain death from afar as a skilled archer. Tailor your skills and abilities to suit your personal combat preferences and become a legendary warrior of ancient Greece.

In The Last King the fate of ancient Greece rests in your hands. Will you rise as a legendary hero, leading your army to victory and ensuring the survival of your people? Unleash your strategic prowess, harness your combat skills, and forge your own path in this immersive and challenging ancient Greek adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: Players can experience violence, battle, fighting, blood and dismemberment all created to bring immersion and realism in the battle experience.

name: The Last King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 or above
  • Processor: intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 or above
  • Processor: intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Temas sensíveis

short_description: Command a fearless Greek army against Persian invasion. Recruit, train, and promote your army. Build marching camp, resource gathering stations, trade outposts and REBUILD your razed city. Master ancient war tactics and strategies to defeat your enemies
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Greek*, Japanese*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
